name: lunar-wing
effect: Cures the sailor’s son of his nightmares; no reward, only a side effect of seeing Cresselia.
short_effect: Cures sailor’s son of nightmares in Canalave City.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A feather that glows like the moon. It’s said to possess the power to dispel nightmares.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A feather that glows like the moon. It’s said to possess the power to dispel nightmares.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A feather that glows like the moon. It’s said to possess the power to dispel nightmares.
